name: taglicious
description: Taglicious is a versatile and extensible React component for managing tags and multi-select inputs with customizable rendering and seamless integration with various UI libraries.
author: Miguel Guedes <miguel@softgeist.com>

scripts.check: set -e; for i in code lint fmt; do yarn run check:$i; done; echo 'check: PASS'
scripts.check:code: yarn run check:tsc && yarn run check:lint
scripts.check:fmt: set -e; for i in src json md scss; do yarn run check:fmt:$i; done
scripts.fix:fmt: set -e; for i in src json md scss; do yarn run fix:fmt:$i; done
